name: Custom Candle
description: Please contact for details - we can have a candle made from the bottle of your choice.

name: Community Shelter Board - Cedarwood
description:
WELCOME HOME.

Community Shelter Board is ending homelessness in our community. CSB allocates more than $13 million in funding for homelessness prevention initiatives, emergency shelters, housing services, and supportive housing -showcasing an innovative, collaborative model for ending homelessness. CSB also works collaboratively with partner agencies to unify resources and knowledge, helping more than 8,000 people each year.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <b>Cedarwood<b>
- 6 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle
- Hand cut & polished, upcycled wine bottle container
- Single wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil)

25% of profits go directly to the featured community organization.

name: H.E.L.P. Malawi Children
description:
<FONT COLOR="A5DF00"><b>HOPE, EDUCATE, LOVE, PROTECT. <b></FONT>

H.E.L.P. Malawi Children's mission is to develop the pathway for children living in rural regions of Africa to become integral members and leaders in society through quality education. H.E.L.P. is committed to cultivating the academic potential of each child through a comprehensive range of opportunities in primary school to prepare students for the next level of education, and to support those efforts through secondary school scholarships.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <FONT COLOR="A5DF00"><b>Roasted Pumpkin Chestnut<b></FONT>
- 12 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle
- Hand cut & polished, upcycled wine bottle container
- Single wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil)

25% of profits go directly to the featured community organization.



*Actual product may vary slightly from image due to natural variances in bottle width and color

name: Ride for World Health
description:
<FONT COLOR="FF6600"><b>WORLD CLASS.<b></FONT>

Ride for World Health was started by a group of medical students at the Ohio State University in 2006. By bringing together activists from across the country, they hope to inspire other medical professionals, volunteers, and communities-at-large to stand up as a unified voice for the millions who suffer at home and abroad. The 3,700 mile R4WH bicycle trek takes place during April and May, traversing the United States from San Diego to Washington D.C.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <FONT COLOR="FF6600"><b>Fresh Linens<b></FONT>
- 12 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle
- Hand cut & polished, upcycled wine bottle container
- Single wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil)

25% of profits go directly to the featured community organization.



*Actual product may vary slightly from image due to natural variances in bottle width and color

name: Kinder Key - Fall/Winter - Apple Spice
description:
<FONT COLOR="FF3399"><b>NEW HOPE FOR YOUNG HEARTS.<b></FONT>

Kinder Key serves as an auxiliary of Nationwide Children’s Hospital and is dedicated to providing new hope for young hearts through their support of The Heart Center at Nationwide Children’s. Since their inception in 1954, Kinder Key has demonstrated their commitment by raising over $2 million toward the hospital’s mission of providing the highest quality health care to all children regardless of their ability to pay.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <FONT COLOR="FF3399"><b>Apple Spice<b></FONT>

name: Pets Without Parents - Cucumber Melon
description:
<FONT COLOR="33CC00"><b>SHUFFLE, PAWS, PLAY.<b></FONT>

Founded in June of 2001, Pets Without Parents is a non-profit, no-kill, all-breed shelter for dogs and cats. Their mission is to place every pet that enters their shelter into a loving, permanent home, and to motivate the local community to support their no-kill mission and spay-neuter efforts through donations, volunteering, and adoption opportunities.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <FONT COLOR="33CC00"><b>Cucumber Melon<b></FONT>

name: Franklinton Gardens - Fresh Citrus Basil
description:
<FONT COLOR = 339900><b>READY. SET. GROW!<b></FONT>

Franklinton Gardens is a nonprofit urban farm located in Franklinton, a historic neighborhood on the west side of Columbus, Ohio. They are dedicated to growing and sharing healthy food, creating beauty in abandoned places, promoting nutrition and active living, and building community with their neighbors.

<hr size=1px width="100%">

Scent: <FONT COLOR="339900"><b>Fresh Citrus Basil<b></FONT>
- 12 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle
- Hand cut & polished, upcycled wine bottle container
- Single wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil)
- Features actual soil from Franklinton Gardens!

25% of profits go directly to the featured community organization.



*Actual product may vary slightly from image due to natural variances in bottle width and color

name: Watershed Distillery for The Corey Lehman Scholarship Fund - Vodka - Vanilla Earl Grey
description:
A special collection of premium candles made from the upcycled bottles of Columbus's finest distilleries, meaderies, and breweries. We are truly privileged to have such skilled artisans in our community and this is our own unique way of supporting and showcasing them. OH-IO!
CWC is proud to partner with Watershed Distillery in support of The Corey Lehman Scholarship Fund. The Fund was formed in 2002 in memory of two exceptional Big Walnut High School student-athletes & leaders named Corey Lehman & Steve Morgenstern; both of whom were tragically killed by a drunk driver. Each year The Fund provides scholarships to outstanding Big Walnut High School senior student-athletes to continue Corey & Steve's legacy of academics, athletics, volunteer work, community involvement, & leadership. Scent: Vanilla Earl Grey - 17 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle - Hand cut & polished, upcycled Watershed Distillery Vodka bottle - Single wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil) *25% of profits goes directly to The Corey Lehman Scholarship Fund.

name: Middle West Spirits for the Columbus Music Co-op - OYO Vodka - Unscented
description:
A special collection of premium candles made from the upcycled bottles of Columbus's finest distilleries, meaderies, and breweries. We are truly privileged to have such skilled artisans in our community and this is our own unique way of supporting and showcasing them. OH-IO!
We've been fortunate enough to partner with our friends at Middle West Spirits to bring you this exceptional line of candles. Nothing goes better with locally distilled spirits than local music. Accordingly, 25% of the profits from each candle will benefit the Columbus Music Co-op. Unscented - 17 oz hand poured natural soy wax candle - Hand cut & polished, upcycled Middle West Spirits OYO Vodka bottle - Double wick (sustainable coreless cotton & braided paper primed with vegetable oil) *25% of profits goes directly to the Columbus Music Co-op. *Also available exclusively at the Middle West Spirits distillery store.
